### Create User

```{r}

new$reset()

new$username <- "root"
new$password <- "2020"
```

### Login

```{r}
new$session
new$login("root", "2021")

new$login("root1", "2020")
new$session

new$login("root", "2020")
new$session
new$logout()
new$session
```
